profile.bio: A life in IT, Digital Equipment Corporation where I cut my teeth. Setting up PRL Scotland and creating I/O Exchange, Technical Director, Hanon Solutions and CTO of OLM. Today COO of Nalanda Technology rediscovering search and Unified Information Access
